Getting Started

Download latest version

Option 1: Bower (recommended)

Navigate to your project via the command line and run the following command:

bower install tink --save

Note that this command requires you to have Bower installed.

Option 2: Manual download

Press the button to download all the necessary files.

Download Tink (v1.2.3)

Note that the manual option requires more setup (see below).

Installation guide

tl;dr

In your main HTML file:

  • include the Tink stylesheet;
  • include jQuery;
  • include the AngularJS library and its dependencies;
  • include the Tink API and Tink directives.

Step 1: Tink styling

Include the following line in the <head> section of your main HTML file:

<link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/tink/framework/styles/tink.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/tink/framework/styles/tink-stad.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/tink/framework/styles/tink-ocmw.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/tink/framework/styles/tink-politie.min.css">

Note that the filepath may differ for your project. Adjust this if needed.

Step 2: JavaScript

In order to use the interactive part of Tink you also need to have jQuery and AngularJS installed.

  • If you used Bower to install Tink, these dependencies are automatically installed with it. Skip to step 3.
  • Keep reading if you installed Tink manually…

First download jQuery v2.1.x and add it to your project folder.

Then download AngularJS v1.2.x. Also add it to your project folder.

Step 3: Installing the script files

Include the following lines in your HTML, preferably just above </body>:

<script src="bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular/angular.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-resource/angular-resource.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-cookies/angular-cookies.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-sanitize/angular-sanitize.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-animate/angular-animate.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-touch/angular-touch.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-route/angular-route.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/tink/framework/scripts/api.min.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/tink/framework/scripts/tink-directives.min.js"></script>

Note that some filepaths may differ for your project. Adjust these if needed.

Step 4: Done

Hey, we're glad you made it!
Now go and make the next big thing!

Starter template

If you're looking for a basic template to start with, take a look at the following code:

<!doctype html> <html class="no-js has-nav-left" data-ng-app="tinkApp"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Tink</title> <meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1.0,user-scalable=no,minimum-scale=1.0"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/tink/framework/styles/tink.min.css" /> </head> <body>
  • Your project
  • Open menu

  • Your project

  • Link 1
  • Link 2 with subitems
    • Subitem 1
    • Subitem 2
    • Subitem 3
<script src="bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular/angular.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-resource/angular-resource.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-cookies/angular-cookies.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-sanitize/angular-sanitize.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-animate/angular-animate.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-touch/angular-touch.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/angular-route/angular-route.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/tink/framework/scripts/api.min.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/tink/framework/scripts/tink-directives.min.js"></script> <script>angular.module('tinkApp', ['ngAnimate', 'ngCookies', 'ngResource', 'ngRoute', 'ngSanitize', 'ngTouch', 'tink']);</script> </body> </html> <!doctype html> <html class="no-js has-nav-left" data-ng-app="tinkApp"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Tink</title> <meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1.0,user-scalable=no,minimum-scale=1.0"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/tink/framework/styles/tink-stad.min.css" /> </head> <body>

Of course you are also going to need routing and other things for your application. This is beyond the scope of the Tink documentation, but can be found elsewhere.
